results.content: It was straightforward and to the point. It covered many topics that are essential for JavaScript programming.

results.content: Short and concise explanations on critic points, helping build student's confidence.
results.content_html: Short and concise explanations on critic points, helping build student's confidence.

results.content:
The course itself is pretty light in terms of material, all of which is already provided elsewhere online for free—and this course doesn't not build on or explain the material in a way that justifies paying for it.

Furthermore, like most developer training materials, this course sadly presents objects, functions, and a host of methods without context. It would be much more helpful if the instructor provided common use cases in a development context for applying these concepts.

The instructor also wasn't responsive to comments I left with questions about the course material—so that's also disappointing.
results.content_html:
The course itself is pretty light in terms of material, all of which is already provided elsewhere online for free—and this course doesn't not build on or explain the material in a way that justifies paying for it.

Furthermore, like most developer training materials, this course sadly presents objects, functions, and a host of methods without context. It would be much more helpful if the instructor provided common use cases in a development context for applying these concepts.

The instructor also wasn't responsive to comments I left with questions about the course material—so that's also disappointing.

results.content: This is not really an intermediate course, though others may disagree. I think the author does a good job explaining something can should be in a beginner course.
results.content_html: This is not really an intermediate course, though others may disagree. I think the author does a good job explaining something can should be in a beginner course.

results.content: This course is very outdated, so much so that some of the required components were no longer available.  If this course is going to be offered, it needs to be updated so that people can actually use it. Very disappointed but glad I only spend $15.
